description: The HpeSecureEraseReport resource describes the secure erase status and the other details of the devices during the secure system erase operation.

Description.description: This represents the description of the secure erase report parameters.

DeviceType.description: This indicates the device type being securely erased.

enumDescriptions.SmartStorage: This indicates the device type is Smart Storage
enumDescriptions.SATADrives: This indicates the device type is SATA drive
enumDescriptions.NVMeDrives: This indicates the device type is NVMe drive
enumDescriptions.NVDIMM: This indicates the device type is NVDIMM/Persistent Memory
enumDescriptions.TPM: This indicates the device type is TPM (Trusted Platform Module)
enumDescriptions.UEFIStore: This indicates the device type is UEFI Store
enumDescriptions.NAND: This indicates the device type is Embedded NAND Flash
enumDescriptions.NVRAM: This indicates the device type is NVRAM (Battery backed SRAM)

EraseType.description: This indicates the NIST SP800-88 Rev.1 (National Institute of Standards and Technology) approved techniques to sanitize a particular media or device.

enumDescriptions.Purge: This indicates that Purge technique is used to sanitize the device.
enumDescriptions.Clear: This indicates that Clear technique is used to sanitize the device.

EraseStatus.description: Indicates the secure erase status of the individual components

enumDescriptions.CompletedWithErrors: Indicates Secure System Erase process has been completed with some errors
enumDescriptions.CompletedWithSuccess: Indicates Secure System Erase process has been completed with no errors
enumDescriptions.Failed: Indicates Secure System Erase process has failed
enumDescriptions.Idle: Indicates Secure System Erase is not started
enumDescriptions.InProgress: Indicates Secure System Erase process is under progress
enumDescriptions.Initiated: Indicates Secure System Erase process is started

DeviceIdentifier.description: This represents the unique identifier for the device in the system like it's physical location or the exact device path etc.,

SerialNumber.description: This represents the serial number of the device being erased.

EraseStartTime.description: The date and time of the start of secure erase operation, ISO8601 Redfish-style time

EraseEndTime.description: The date and time of the end of secure erase operation, ISO8601 Redfish-style time

title: #HpeSecureEraseReport.v1_0_0.HpeSecureEraseReport
